title: TUESDAY - DK Metcalf shines on MNF 2020
itunes:title: TUESDAY - DK Metcalf shines on MNF 2020
description:
Break out those calendars as we have a host of schedule changes (0:13) including the Ravens and Steelers moving once again. Speaking of moving (1:17), the 49ers will be heading to the "Valley of the Sun" for the foreseeable future. DK Metcalf goes off on Monday Night Football against the Eagles, making them pay for not drafting him (2:19). Patriots quarterback Cam Newton unapologetic (2:57) for his play in the Patriots win over the Cardinals. Plus, the Texans will be without their top receiver for the rest of the year (4:00)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
